text: A luxury car is a type of car that gives a feeling of comfort and luxury in travel. A luxury car has expensive features, and equipment, and buyers expect a better build quality. == Luxury car makers == Car maker Luxury car models Aston Martin Aston Martin, Lagonda Auburn Duesenberg, Cord, Auburn BMW BMW, Rolls-Royce BYD Denza, Yangwang, Fangchengbao Chery Exeed, Luxeed Chrysler Corporation Imperial, Chrysler, DeSoto Dongfeng Motor Corporation Voyah, M-Hero (Mengshi) FAW Group Hongqi Ferrari N.V.
